reviews.review: funny portal and robot ball man
Old but still Gold. Need I say more
I've played 48 hours so far and this is the best game I've ever played
Buen juego, no decepciona si lo comparas con portal 1
not hard, just puzzles and the co-op can be awesome when playing with your friends

22 hours and 2 games later and still no cake, bad game /j

on a more realistic note, portal 2 was the best game i played in 2021. i feel bad having put off buying it for so many years. the groundwork that was set by the first portal was expanded on and made astronomically better in the second installment. i 100% recommend this (and the first one) to anyone who has a low end pc and wants to have a game they can sink hours into. the comedy in these games, albeit cheesy, is charming and lovable. 200% would recommend

One of the best games I've ever played, very well thought out puzzles that are challenging but not frustrating. Very fun co-op, storytelling, and characters. I believe if it came out today it would still be just as big as when it released.
